Two accounts. Account A has a resource (ec2) that you want to access with a Lambda Function that is in Account B. But, the resource in A is inside a VPC. This article depicts 3 ways to access, and all of them involve deploying the Lambda in a VPC, then connecting the two VPCs in a different way.
I decided to go with peering.
